entity.name: Andrew Neil
entity.description: BBC journalist and broadcaster, chairman of Press Holdings Media Group, whose titles include The Spectator, and the ITP Media Group.

text: @afneil Trump’s behaviour is transparent to everyone but him. His rant about #WHO was clearly intended to deflect from his own arrogant and complacent performance earlier in the #covid19 crisis. Trump will be personally responsible for millions of deaths if he does cancel WHO funding.
